name: Compass Initiative
summary: Exploring radical coordination technology — tools, frameworks, and practices for decentralized alignment and decision-making.
purpose: Develop and maintain coordination infrastructure that makes shared values and ongoing work visible and easy to contribute to.

name: AI Safety Workshop
summary: Building communities focused on responsible AI development, with the backing of JAISI.
purpose: Build and sustain communities focused on responsible AI development, fostering dialogue and shared practices around AI safety.
activities: Hosting workshops on responsible AI development
Building community networks around AI safety
Coordinating with JAISI on safety initiatives

name: Artificial Life
summary: Exploring the essence of life by constructing living systems.
purpose: Advance understanding of life's fundamental principles through computational and constructive approaches to living systems.

name: Daboteng House (Bhutan–Chiba Tech Initiative)
summary: Providing Bhutanese students with scholarship and joint research opportunities such as the satellite project.
purpose: Create educational and research pathways between Bhutan and Chiba Tech, providing Bhutanese students with scholarships and joint research opportunities.

name: Neurodiversity & Connected Learning
summary: Designing education that honors learner's unique mind and fosters individual growth.
purpose: Design inclusive educational approaches that recognize and honor neurodivergent minds, fostering individual growth through connected learning.

name: Probabilistic Computing
summary: Advancing smarter, safer AI using probabilistic programming to help machines reason more like humans.
purpose: Develop probabilistic programming methods that enable machines to reason under uncertainty more like humans, producing smarter and safer AI systems.
activities: Developing probabilistic programming languages and tools
Applying probabilistic computing to real-world problems

name: Radical Transformation Award
summary: A 10M yen prize recognizing transformative individuals advancing human flourishing.
purpose: Recognize and support transformative individuals who advance human flourishing through an annual 10 million yen prize.

name: Tea Project
summary: Cultivating humane technology and community through tea philosophy and the tea house.
purpose: Cultivate humane technology and community through the practice and philosophy of tea, using the tea house as a space for reflection and connection.
activities: Exploring intersections of tea philosophy and technology
Maintaining the tea house as a community space

name: Sustainable Robotics Construction
summary: Developing voxel-based, sustainable robotic construction methods in collaboration with MIT.
purpose: Advance sustainable construction through ongoing research into voxel-based robotic methods, in collaboration with MIT.
activities: Collaborating with MIT on construction robotics

name: AI in Healthcare
summary: Applying artificial intelligence to transform cardiovascular research and clinical trials through a partnership between Mount Sinai, Chiba Tech, and Fujita Medical University.
purpose: Leverage AI to make clinical trials more efficient and lead to faster advances in patient care, focusing on cardiovascular research across institutional partners.
activities: Developing AI methods for cardiovascular research
Collaborating with Mount Sinai and Fujita Medical University
Making clinical trials more efficient through AI
